snippet.title: Truco! Chapter 1 trailer - Available at Itch and Gamejolt
snippet.description:
Play the game:
Itch - https://ninjadalua.itch.io/truco
Gamejolt - https://gamejolt.com/games/truco/680763

Follow us at Twitter!
Cadu (artist) - https://twitter.com/NinjaDaLua
NinjaDaLua Studio - https://twitter.com/NdL_Studio

After losing his soul in a cadgame gamble, a boy must recover it traveling around the Underworld! Face strange creatures and the Devil itself in this RPG with a battle system based on a popular cardgame in Brazil, the Truco! Cheat your way through the challenges you will face and take your Soul back, but remember, the enemies can do the same with you!

Songs used in the trailer:
"Tension Theme" by Umplix
"Jelly Neck" by Dan Knoflicek
"Se essa rua fosse minha Music Box Cover" by R3 Music Box
